title: geertw
author: geertw
content: I want to know if purechain www.pure-chain.com is a valid ICO or would i loos all my money if i invest in this ICO ?Thanks in advance.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: geertw on August 12, 2023, 11:35:52 AMI want to know if purechain www.pure-chain.com is a valid ICO or would i loos all my money if i invest in this ICO ?Thanks in advance.My antivirus software blocks the website, labeling it as a scam. Despite my attempts to search online, I could not find any useful information regarding the website or the coin. I would strongly advise that investing in that ICO will probably result in a loss of your money.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Are ICOs still a thing in 2023?It's obvious my opinion would be never to buy such tokens. Not worth your money in 2023. I believe it's some ERC20 or BEP20 token which has no working product or which offers no real Â solution to the problems we face today.For example when i read this, it sounds so funny and gibberishQuoteOur primary focus is to transform the traditional carbon credit market by introducing transparency, efficiency, and verification - all through the power of blockchain.We've developed a unique platform that tokenizes carbon credits, enabling direct peer-to-peer transactions. This innovative approach eliminates the usual intermediaries, reducing transaction times and costs. By recording every transaction on an immutable, publicly visible ledger, we ensure the complete traceability and credibility of each carbon credit, from its origin to its retiremen

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: @OP, I don't think that you're genuinely asking if it's a legit ICO or not. I am sure that even newbies are aware that ICOs are no longer a thing today.One thing that makes me think is that you're not asking genuinely about that ICO but it's likely that this purechain is what you're working with and trying to get relevant on these times.
